alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 05 at 7:48PM MDT until August 05 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAS ANIMAS COUNTY... At 748 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 11 miles west of Kim, or 33 miles northeast of Des Moines, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Kim. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
